import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete, } from 'react-icons/md'; import { Container, ProductTable, Total } from './styles'; function Cart({ cart, dispatch }) { return ( Produto Quantidade Subtotal {cart.map(product => ( {product.title} {product.priceFormatted}
R$258,80 ))}
TOTAL R$1920,28
); } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ cart: state.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Cart);
